The five male members of the Mohler family charged with sex crimes appeared in court in Lafayette County, Mo. on Thursday for the first time. The men face charges on numerous counts, including sodomy and rape with a child under the age of 12.
 
 .... The suspects include Burrell Mohler Sr., 77, of Independence and his four adult sons Burrell Edward Mohler Jr., 53, of Independence; Jared Leroy Mohler, 48, of Columbia; Roland Neil Mohler, 47, of Bates City; and David A. Mohler, 52, of Lamoni, Iowa.
 
 .... Three of the five men charged in this case are lay ministers in in the Community of Christ church....

 Mohler men charged in shocking child sex case appear in court
 
 Another sterling example of Southern Christian values.
